Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Transmogrification \Trans*mog`ri*fi*ca"tion\, n. The act of transmogrifying, or the state of being transmogrified; transformation. [Colloq.] [1913 Webster]
Clive, who wrote me about the transmogrification of our schoolfellow, an attorney's son. --Thackeray. [1913 Webster]
transmogrification n : the act of changing into a different form or appearance (especially a fantastic or grotesque one); "the transmogrification of the prince into a porcupine"
